Description: Limestone relief; central cross-within-wreath flanked by the figures of Saint Pakene and Saint Victor on horseback bearing swords; Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.132, Pl.91)
Badawy 1978 / Coptic art and archaeology (3.149, p.193)
Beckwith 1963 / Coptic sculpture (no.129 (p.56, pl.56)) (dates 7th or 8th century)
Schaten 1999 / Griechische und Koptische Bauinschriften (p.305, note 2) (further bibliography)
Budge 1909 / Guide to the Egyptian collections (Sculpture). (pl.53)
Exhibition history: 2015 1 April - 15 Sept. Berlin, Bode Museum, 'EIN GOTT - Abrahams Erben am Nil'
Associated names: Named in inscription & portrayed: St Pakene
Named in inscription & portrayed: St Victor
Named in inscription: Apa Asa Antseinou
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 91:1 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
